page.title: 14The Industrial Estate
page.content: On the outskirts of Castle-Douglas there is a small Industrial Estate. It is situated between the A75 and A714 roads. This Industrial Estate has been developed over the past 15 years. Some of the firms in the Estate are:_ FORTNUMS: suppliers of farm foods and equipment. CALEDONIAN ASTRASEAL: makers of double glazing doors and windows for Scotland and the North of England. JAMES GORDON: suppliers of farm machinery e.g tractors for the Stewartry. McELROY THE PRINTERS: a small business using modern equipment including computers. One computer is linked to another computer in England to produce horse-racing tickets.
